battle_traits.name: Eye Of The Gods
battle_traits.description: The Slaves to Darkness seek to attract the notice of the gods by performing great deeds in battle. To court the gaze of these beings is perilous, yet those who prove worthy are made mighty indeed.
battle_traits.declare: Each friendly Slaves to Darkness unit that destroyed an enemy unit this turn is a target. Friendly Beasts and non-Hero Monsters cannot be targeted by this ability.
battle_traits.effect: Make a reward roll of D6 for each target and apply the corresponding effect below. You can re-roll the reward roll for the target, but if you do so and you roll a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. 1 Snubbed by the Gods: No effect. 2 Mutative Regrowth: Heal (3) the target. 3 Unnatural Grace: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target's combat attacks for the rest of the battle. 4 Lurid Aura: The target has Ward (6+) for the rest of the battle. If the target already has Ward (6+), it has Ward (5+) instead. 5 Slaughterer's Might: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the battle. 6 Champion of Chaos: Pick any other effect. The same effect can be applied multiple times to a unit, and more than 1 effect can apply to a unit at the same time.

battle_traits.name: Marks Of Chaos
battle_traits.description: In return for power, a mortal may forsake their soul by pledging it to one or all of the Dark Gods.
battle_traits.effect: Friendly Slaves to Darkness units have 1 of the following effects based on the Mark of Chaos keyword they have. * Undivided: Add 1 to wound rolls for the unit's combat attacks that target a Hero or Monster. * Khorne: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the unit's melee weapons for the rest of the turn if the unit charged in the same turn. * Tzeentch: The unit has Ward (4+) against mortal damage inflicted by Spell abilities and abilities used by Manifestations. * Nurgle: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target the unit. * Slaanesh: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for the unit. If a unit with a Mark of Chaos keyword is replaced, the replacement unit has the same Mark of Chaos keyword.

Legion Of Chaos.name: United In Darkness
Legion Of Chaos.description: The myriad forces of Chaos march to war under a common cause, led by warlords who have put aside their rivalries in the name of laying waste to the lands of a shared foe.
Legion Of Chaos.effect: While there is at least 1 friendly Warriors of Chaos Hero and 1 other friendly Daemon Hero or Darkoath Hero on the battlefield, add 2 to the control scores of friendly Slaves to Darkness units while they are contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory.

Despoilers.reaction_condition: You  declared a Fight ability for a friendly Daemon Prince unit
Despoilers.name: Feral Ruin
Despoilers.description: A Daemon Prince's unholy radiance draws to them the most savage of chaotic creatures, abominations against nature that hunger to spill blood. Used By: The Daemon Prince unit using that Fight ability.
Despoilers.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Slaves to Darkness Monster or Beast unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

Godswrath Warband.name: Ironclad Onslaught
Godswrath Warband.description: When a Chaos horde is on the march, the realms tremble. Hundreds of heavily armoured warriors desecrate all in their path as they roar oaths to the Dark Pantheon.
Godswrath Warband.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by any friendly units to be the target.
Godswrath Warband.effect: Place a defiled token next to the target objective. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting an objective that has a defiled token. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Darkoath Horde.name: Rally The Tribes
Darkoath Horde.description: One of the horde's commanders looses a terrifying battle cry, calling more of their blade-sworn warriors to their side.
Darkoath Horde.declare: If there is a friendly Darkoath Hero on the battlefield, pick a friendly non-Hero non-Unique Darkoath unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
Darkoath Horde.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

heroic_traits.name: FAVOURED OF THE PANTHEON:
heroic_traits.description: The gods watch this warlord's deeds particularly closely.
heroic_traits.effect: This unit can use the 'Eye of the Gods' ability as if it were the end of the turn and it had destroyed an enemy unit this turn.

heroic_traits.name: Deathmonger
heroic_traits.description: Feared across the realms, this hero leaves naught in their wake but a trail of sun-bleached bones.
heroic_traits.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

heroic_traits.name: Radiance Of Dark Glory
heroic_traits.description: In the presence of this champion, the mutative energies of Chaos can seal shut even the most grievous of wounds.
heroic_traits.declare: Pick each damaged friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
heroic_traits.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, Heal (1) the target. Heal (3) the target instead if it is a Monster.

artefacts_of_power.name: Infernal Puppet
artefacts_of_power.description: As it dances upon the aetheric winds, this eldritch marionette violently disrupts the spellcraft of enemy mages.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick a visible enemy Wizard within 24" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: For the rest of the turn, each time the target is picked to use a Spell ability, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target as a reaction. If the target is destroyed by this ability, do not resolve the effect of that Spell ability.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Conqueror'S Crown
artefacts_of_power.description: This blasphemous diadem grants the bearer dominion over the minds of lesser mortals.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy Infantry units while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: REALMWARPER'S TWIST-RUNE:
artefacts_of_power.description: One who bears this cursed rune can bind warped landscapes to their will. Ruptured chasms open as thick palls of dark energy obscure the favoured and their servants from view.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: If the target does not have the 'Obscuring' terrain ability, it gains that ability until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a dice for each model (friendly and enemy) within 1" of the target. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that model's unit.

Lore Of The Damned.name: Spite-Tongue Curse
Lore Of The Damned.description: Uttering the foul syllables of the Dark Tongue until blood pours from their mouth, the caster beseeches the Chaos Gods to destroy their enemies - though such pacts carry with them a terrible cost…
Lore Of The Damned.declare: Pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6. If the casting attempt is unsuccessful or if the spell is unbound, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.
Lore Of The Damned.effect: Inflict 3 mortal damage on the target.

Lore Of The Damned.name: Binding Damnation
Lore Of The Damned.description: At the caster's urging, tendrils of raw Chaos burst from the tortured ground, entwining the limbs of their enemies and rendering them easy prey.
Lore Of The Damned.declare: Pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of The Damned.effect: The target has Strike-last until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of The Damned.name: Daemonic Speed
Lore Of The Damned.description: Infernal winds blow at the back of these hordes, speeding them into battle against the enemies of the gods.
Lore Of The Damned.declare: Pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Slaves to Darkness unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of The Damned.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

Manifestations Of Malevolence.name: Daemonrift
Manifestations Of Malevolence.description: Darkfire Daemonrifts are eldritch portals torn ajar by dark incantations. Once the veil has been sundered, raw magic seeping from the Realm of Chaos forms an opening for the horrors beyond to vent their spite, widened and empowered by spellcraft that draws upon the essence of Chaos.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.declare: If there is not a friendly Darkfire Daemonrift on the battlefield, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.effect: Set up a Darkfire Daemonrift wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Manifestations Of Malevolence.name: Rupture
Manifestations Of Malevolence.description: Realmscourge Ruptures are not subtle weapons. When the necessary magical power has been channelled and released by a tribal shaman, the land itself writhes in the grip of Chaos, sharpened spikes surging forth like an accursed tidal wave to overwhelm anything in their path.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.declare: If there is not a friendly Realmscourge Rupture on the battlefield, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.effect: Set up a Realmscourge Rupture wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Manifestations Of Malevolence.name: Doom-Sigil
Manifestations Of Malevolence.description: Eightfold Doom-Sigils are icons of Chaos in all its glory, blazing symbols of pure ruin. To fall in the presence of such a sorcerous construct is to be damned, for these lingering spells hungrily suck souls into the Realm of Chaos for the gods to feast upon.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.declare: If there is not a friendly Eightfold Doom-Sigil on the battlefield, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestations Of Malevolence.effect: Set up an Eightfold Doom-Sigil wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Dorghar's Claws and Tails is 4.

abilities.name: The Eye Of Sheerian
abilities.description: Torn from the corpse of a mighty dragon, this artefact grants Archaon visions of future events.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. This roll replaces the priority roll of the next battle round. On a 1-3, your opponent must take the first turn of that battle round. On a 4-6, you must take the first turn of that battle round. This ability cannot be used if there is an enemy Archaon on the battlefield.

abilities.name: The Slayer Of Kings
abilities.description: This ancient daemonblade thirsts for the souls of champions and warlords.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, if the unmodified wound roll for 2 or more attacks made with The Slayer of Kings that target the same Hero is 6, that Hero is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: The Favoured Warlord
abilities.description: Archaon ruthlessly exploits the Dark Gods' competition for his service.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the following keywords: Khorne, Tzeentch, Nurgle or Slaanesh. This unit has that keyword in addition to Undivided.

abilities.name: THREE-HEADED TITAN
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the following effects: Filth-spewer: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit, to a maximum of 7. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit. Skull-gorger: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit and roll a dice. If the roll exceeds that unit's Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can Heal (X) this unit, where X is that unit's Health characteristic. Spell-eater: Pick a Manifestation within 12" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, it is banished and inflict D3 mortal damage on the unit that summoned it.

abilities.name: Airborne Horror
abilities.description: Carried aloft by ragged leathery wings, this favoured champion of the Chaos Gods will bring ruin wherever they descend.
abilities.effect: If this unit has Wings, it has a Move characteristic of 10" and has Fly.

abilities.name: Fallen
abilities.description: Some Daemon Princes revel in glory with each worthy foe slain by their hands.
abilities.effect: If this unit has a Trophy Rack, its Hellforged Weapons also have Anti-Hero (+1 Rend).

abilities.name: Ruinous Favour
abilities.description: A Daemon Prince is an unholy conduit for the power and influence of their patron, and those who fight in their monstrous shadow may find themselves marked by the divine.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Unique unit wholly within 12" of this unit that shares a Mark of Chaos keyword with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target can immediately use the 'Eye of the Gods' ability as if it were the end of the turn and they had destroyed an enemy unit this turn.

abilities.name: Relentless Killers
abilities.description: The Varanguard have slaughtered foes beyond counting, butchering their way across the battlefields of the Mortal Realms without mercy.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Blade of Shadows is 6.

abilities.name: Shadow For M
abilities.description: Be'lakor can shift his physical form to be as insubstantial as the mists of Ulgu - and just as hard to land a telling blow upon.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Deadly Trap
abilities.description: The Dark Master delights in lethal reversals of expectation and fate.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Slaves to Darkness units within this unit's combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, that target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.description: Many puppets dance on Be'lakor's infernal strings. Few realise as much until their fate is sealed.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use an ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, that ability has no effect. 6

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.description: With a series of hissed incantations, Be'lakor instils visions of loss and despair in the minds of his enemies to drain them of their fighting spirit.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn: * Subtract 1 from hit rolls from the target's combat attacks. * The target's combat attacks cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

warscrolls.name: ETERNUS BLADE OF THE FIRST PRINCE

abilities.name: Network Of Spies
abilities.description: Eternus commands a legion of agents and operatives to ensure he is always one step ahead of his enemies.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the enemy unit is in combat with a friendly Chaos Legionnaires or Chaos Furies unit. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.
keywords: for a unit within 12" of this unit

warscrolls.name: GAUNT SUMMONER ON DISC OF TZEENTCH

abilities.name: MINIONS OF THE SILVER TOWER:
abilities.description: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve in a Silver Tower. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Book Of Profane Secrets
abilities.description: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in a Silver Tower to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units. 7

abilities.name: ARCANE IMPRISONMENT:
abilities.description: Gaunt Summoners delight in banishing foes to their Silver Towers.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the unmodified casting roll exceeds the target's Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed. For the rest of the battle, that unit cannot be picked to be the target of an ability that allows a replacement unit to be set up.

abilities.name: MINIONS OF THE SILVER TOWER:
abilities.description: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve in a Silver Tower. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Book Of Profane Secrets
abilities.description: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in a Silver Tower to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units. 7

abilities.name: Divert Realmgate
abilities.description: Whispering fell incantations, a Gaunt Summoner can temporarily divert the path of a realmgate, allowing malefic Chaos entities to storm the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Units set up this turn using this unit's 'Book of Profane Secrets' ability can be set up wholly within 18" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units instead of the distances in the ability.

abilities.name: Unleashed Savagery
abilities.description: Suppressing their savage spirit no more, these ferocious warriors hack at the foe in a bestial frenzy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.description: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Warriors of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Venomous Tail Strike
abilities.description: The barbed tail of a Manticore secretes a paralysing toxin that can stun an enemy long enough for the Manticore to tear into them with impunity.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: IRON-WILLED OVERLORD:
abilities.description: Manticores are berserk killers, and any Chaos Lord who rides one to battle displays such obvious dominance that none would dare deny their orders.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the control scores of friendly Warriors of Chaos units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Apex Predator
abilities.description: It is a point of pride to a Manticore rider that they and their steed are the apex predators of the battlefield. They seek out the strongest foes and do not rest until they have proven their supremacy with a vicious kill.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's combat attacks that target that Monster for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

abilities.name: Brutish Rampage
abilities.description: A charging Karkadrak is an almost unstoppable force, capable of smashing straight through even the most determined shieldwall.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: DRIVE THE LEGIONS FORWARD:
abilities.description: Mounted atop a mighty Karkadrak, the Chaos Lord signals the charge.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly non-Hero Warriors of Chaos units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.description: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Warriors of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Glory-Seeker
abilities.description: To earn the favour of their patron, these formidable warriors ruthlessly hunt down enemy monsters and champions.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for attacks that target Heroes or Monsters.

abilities.name: Myr Midon Rage
abilities.description: Every wound inflicted on a Myrmidon only serves to stoke its rage further.
abilities.effect: While this unit is damaged, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Flailing Fists is 4.

abilities.name: PROTECTION OF THE DARK GODS:
abilities.description: Worshippers of the Ruinous Powers gather around these shrines in the hope of receiving divine protection.
abilities.effect: Friendly Warriors of Chaos units have Ward (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. 4

abilities.name: Favour Of Chaos
abilities.description: The Shrinemaster invokes the Dark Pantheon to bless nearby followers with their favour.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Slaves to Darkness unit wholly within 12" of this unit that shares a Mark of Chaos keyword with this unit to be the target. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Apply 1 of the following effects to the target for the rest of the turn depending on which Mark of Chaos keyword this unit has: * Undivided: When the target uses the 'Rally' command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6. * Khorne: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target's attacks. * Tzeentch: The target has Ward (5+). * Nurgle: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target's attacks. * Slaanesh: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3. If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick up to 2 eligible units to be the targets instead of 1.

melee.name: Daemonic Blade or Claw Piston-driven Legs and

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Piston-driven Legs and Daemonic Blade or Claw is 6.

abilities.name: Implacable Advance
abilities.description: This daemonic engine is utterly relentless in its desire to pay off the soul-tithe owed to its masters.
abilities.effect: This unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Piston-Driven Carnage
abilities.description: The mechanical lower limbs of a Soul Grinder crush, stamp and impale without mercy.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this unit can move 6". During that move, it can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Swift Death
abilities.description: Chaos Chariots are at their most deadly on the charge, where their considerable bulk and bladed wheels can cause untold devastation.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Brutal Momentum
abilities.description: The ferocity of Gorebeasts is terrible to behold as they carve a path of bloody destruction through the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the 'Power Through' command, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target and add 3" to the distance this unit can move as part of that ability.

abilities.name: Oath Of Murder
abilities.description: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy Hero or Monster this turn, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: RUIN-BLESSED CONQUEROR: A
abilities.description: Warqueen heeds the whispers of the gods, ravaging lands in their name and drawing their gaze onto her warrior hordes.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that this unit is contesting.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, other friendly Darkoath units have Ward (5+) while they are contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Oath Of Supremacy
abilities.description: By the will of the gods, this warrior leads her barbarous horde into the lands of the enemy, allowing none to oppose them.
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within enemy territory and charged this phase, for the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Darkoath units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Heralds Of Ruination
abilities.description: Paragons of the Dark Gods, Chaos Chosen cut a swathe through the enemy lines, leaving nothing but blood and ruin in their wake.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Bringers Of Desolation
abilities.description: Chaos Warriors fight with relentless ferocity in those places consecrated to the Dark Gods.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Rune-etched Weapons while it is contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: BEAST
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Drawn To Power
abilities.description: Even cursed with their hideous and twisted form, Chaos Spawn still covet the boons of the Dark Gods and are drawn to those most favoured by their patron.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Daemon Prince that shares a Mark of Chaos keyword with it, you can re-roll the random characteristic rolls for this unit's Move and Attacks characteristics.

abilities.name: Impaling Charge
abilities.description: A charging Chaos Knight is capable of spitting several enemies at once with the point of their ensorcelled polearm.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of its Cursed Lances.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Betentacled Maw is 8.

abilities.name: Mutant Regeneration
abilities.description: This unnatural abomination is invigorated by the raw power of Chaos.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Aura Of Mutation
abilities.description: To stand near a Mutalith can have horrific consequences.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect below. If this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Tzeentch Wizard, you can roll 2 dice instead, pick either result, then apply the corresponding effect below. 1 Untouched: No effect. 2 Hideous Disfigurement: Subtract 3 from the target's control score until the start of your next turn. 3 Troggbrains: The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn. 4 Gift of Mutations: Subtract 1" from the target's Move characteristic for the rest of the battle. 5 Horrific Absorption: Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target. Then, Heal (D6) this unit. 6 Transmogrification: Pick any other effect.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Razor-tipped Claws is 5.

abilities.name: Rampaging Charge
abilities.description: The Slaughterbrute crashes into the enemy's ranks in a frenzy of destruction.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target unit is Infantry, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

abilities.name: Sigils Of Domination
abilities.description: By carving runes of domination into a Slaughterbrute's back and driving cursed blades of binding into its flesh, the monster's will can be bound to a champion of Chaos.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Hero within this unit's combat range to be this unit's master.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, while this unit is within its master's combat range, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Sow Confusion
abilities.description: To the disciples of Be'lakor, subterfuge and lies are as keen as any blade.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Crazed Flock
abilities.description: A flock of snapping, screeching Raptoryx is capable of swiftly bringing down any prey should they catch them unawares.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons.

abilities.name: BEAST
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Sneaky Little Devils
abilities.description: Chaos Furies are spiteful creatures that utterly loathe the idea of engaging in a fair fight, much preferring - where possible - to stab distracted enemies in the back.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

abilities.name: Dominate Mind
abilities.description: A Sphiranx can manipulate the actions of its enemies with a simple glance.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target's Control characteristic, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Cursed Destroyers
abilities.description: Once skilled masons, these creatures have been cursed by the Everchosen to now live only to destroy.
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 1" of this unit, then pick each other unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: DEBILITATING SHOCKWAVE:
abilities.description: The vicious spikes that erupt from an onrushing Realmscourge Rupture impale those unfortunate enough to be struck by them even as the tremors that accompany them send those nearby staggering.
abilities.declare: If this Manifestation charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any models in the target unit are slain by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Empowered By Atrocity
abilities.description: The souls of those slain in the presence of an Eightfold Doom-Sigil are absorbed by the magical manifestation, feeding the Dark Gods' eternal hunger and inspiring their servants to battle all the harder, even as their own lives are offered in tribute.
abilities.effect: If 2 or more units (friendly or enemy) were destroyed this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Slaves to Darkness units while they are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: Fuelled By Sorcery
abilities.description: A Darkfire Daemonrift absorbs magical power, widening and expelling ever more gouts of ruinous sorcery as it hungrily devours arcane energies.
abilities.effect: Each time a spell is successfully cast by a unit within 12" of this Manifestation, give this Manifestation 1 ruinous energy point, to a maximum of 6. Each time this Manifestation uses a Shoot ability, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Darkfire Torrent for each ruinous energy point it has. If this Manifestation is removed from play, all of its ruinous energy points are lost.

abilities.name: Draw Power
abilities.description: Constructed at confluences where magical ley lines converge, a Nexus Chaotica can draw power from the realms and into a floating crucible.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Give a number of power points to this terrain feature equal to the roll. This terrain feature can have a maximum of 12 power points at once.

abilities.name: Infernal Sorcery
abilities.description: A sorcerer of Chaos can draw upon the bound daemons of the Nexus Chaotica to empower their spellcasting.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 3 or more power points, pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Wizard within 3" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 power points from this terrain feature, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Corrupt The Realms
abilities.description: These diabolical constructs use harnessed daemonic power to corrupt the geomantic energy of the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 9 or more power points, pick an objective or terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature to be the source. Then, pick any number of enemy units within 3" of the source to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove 9 power points from this terrain feature, then roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Feed On Flesh
abilities.description: Having been appeased with sacrificial blood, this creature may bestow dark blessings upon its kin.
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this unit, give this unit a sacrifice point, to a maximum of 6. If there are more than 1 friendly Darkoath Wilderfiend units within 12" of the slain model, only 1 of them can be given a sacrifice point for that slain model.

abilities.name: BEAST
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Primal Sorcery
abilities.description: Though bestial, Darkoath Wilderfiends possess innate powers of sorcery.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the following effects: Mind Shroud: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. If any of the rolls are a 5+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn. Warping Balefire: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. Dark Might: Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of sacrifice points this unit has. After applying the effect you picked, reset this unit's sacrifice points to 0.

abilities.name: Cavalry Warleader
abilities.description: The Darkoath Chieftain leads the cavalry swiftly into the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly Darkoath Cavalry units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Oath Of Murder
abilities.description: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy Hero or Monster this turn, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Oath Of The Marauder
abilities.description: These bloodthirsty tribal warriors loudly declare vows of violence and slaughter as they race after their foes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Glorious Death
abilities.description: Ever keen to earn the favour of their tribe, when the eyes of the fiercest fighters are upon them, these warriors will not go down without a fight.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly Darkoath Heroes, each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Oath Of Conquest
abilities.description: Heeding their Godspeaker's proclamations, these warriors seek to earn glory by driving back the enemy.
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Oath Of The Raider
abilities.description: Before battle, Fellriders swear oaths to harry the enemy without mercy, showing no mercy to those stragglers who fall beneath their axes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and is only in combat with 1 enemy unit, and that enemy unit is only in combat with this unit, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Swift Attackers
abilities.description: As they close in on the enemy at frightening speed, these skilled horsemen are nigh impossible to hit with missile fire.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Gorbolga is 3.

abilities.name: WARLORD OF THE FIRST CIRCLE:
abilities.description: Abraxia commands the Swords of Chaos with relentless brutality.
abilities.effect: If a friendly Varanguard unit uses the 'Relentless Killers' ability while it is wholly within 12" of this unit, that unit does not have Strike-last as a result of that ability.

abilities.name: Roar Of Domination
abilities.description: The Thanatorg is quick to put potential usurpers of Abraxia's power in their place.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: BLOOD OF MOLTEN VARANITE:
abilities.description: Any who wound the Thanatorg risk being splashed by its highly mutative blood.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice each time a damage point inflicted by a combat attack is allocated to this unit. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: GORBOLGA THE ACCURS'D:
abilities.description: A 'gift' from the Everchosen, Gorbolga is a varanite spear that carries a potent mutative curse - but should its wielder's will slip, they too will learn of its hunger…
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect: 1 Uncontrollable Power: Allocate 1 damage point to this unit. 2 The Spear Slumbers: No effect. 3-5 White-hot Varanite: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Gorbolga for the rest of the turn. Rampant Mutation: The effect of 'White-hot Varanite' applies and this unit's Gorbolga has Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn. 6

abilities.name: Carve A Path To Glory
abilities.description: Ruthless in battle, Gunnar Brand closes in on the enemy's champions, claiming skulls and earning glory with each swing of his axes.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn. This unit can only use the second Fight ability if it is in combat with an enemy Hero, and if it does so, it must pick an enemy Hero to be the target of all of its attacks.

abilities.name: Oath Of Bloodshed
abilities.description: Though he is contemptuous of the gods, Gunnar is still Darkoath; he is not so foolish as to reject their boons should they seek to reward his murder-making.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any enemy Heroes were slain by this unit's combat attacks this turn.
abilities.effect: Friendly Gunnar's Oathsworn units have Ward (4+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Swift As The Wind
abilities.description: Singri's horsemanship is unrivalled by any of the Darkoath. She weaves deftly across the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire and loosing deadly accurate shots with her bow in return.
abilities.effect: Only critical hits score successful hits for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Uncanny Shot
abilities.description: Gunnar Brand has been saved on more than one occasion by a well-placed arrow from Singri.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit's Singri's Warbow for attacks that target enemy units that are within 6" of a friendly Gunnar Brand.

abilities.name: Withering Death
abilities.description: Nadja spits a vile curse in the Dark Tongue, drawing unnatural shadows to coil around an enemy champion and sap their life force.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy Hero within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target and subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Broken Nadja
abilities.description: Broken Nadja wields the energies of ruin itself through dark incantations.
abilities.effect: While this unit's Broken Nadja is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).
